name: Zombie Swarm!
description:
Welcome to Zombie Swarm!
Download now and play for free!

Create the DEADLIEST TRAPS MAZE ever:
- Place traps and DESIGN the deadliest layout.
- Make sure your traps cover all flanks and SURVIVE the zombie swarm.
- Earn money, unlock new traps and make your MAZE BIGGER and DEADLIEST!

DOWNLOAD NOW, and get ready to SURVIVE!
